title: Development Process of an IMS LD-Based Language Learning Design Engine

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Learning Experience and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Course Focused on Implementing Learning Flows Using IMS LD Standards in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can describe the fundamental principles and components of IMS LD-based instructional design
Learners can simulate language learning flows using Petri net models
Learners can flexibly modify a learning design engine based on open architecture
Learners optimize learning flows by analyzing formative assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
